sentences.sContent: The body shell of the Oriental hornet converts sunlight into electricity. Go figure.
sentences.sContent_eng: The body shell of the Oriental hornet converts sunlight into electricity. Go figure.
sentences.sCn: 东方大黄蜂的身体外壳能把太阳光换转成电能，想想吧！

sentences.sContent: I wonder how different the hornet tissues actually are from those of that butterfly.
sentences.sContent_eng: I wonder how different the hornet tissues actually are from those of that butterfly.
sentences.sCn: 我很好奇，这些大黄蜂的组织和那种蝴蝶之间到底有多不同。

trans.tranOther: a large black and yellow flying insect that can sting
